Name: Sapwood Blade
Title: Forest Sanctuary: Sapwood Blade
Desc: "...Even so, your stories and mine will leave their traces in the depths of the desert, like the footprints of the Forest Kind."\n"So shall past friendships peacefully sleep, like an Aranara transformed into a seed."

Talent.Name: Sapwood Blade
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>The character deals +1 DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When entering play:</color> When the character to which this is attached next uses a Normal Attack during this Round: Create 2 Elemental Dice of this character's Elemental Type.\n(<color=#FFFFFFFF>Only {SPRITE_PRESET#3205}Sword Characters</color> can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon)
